item.description:
Sorry, we still do not have a location to meet that is free and where we can set up a projector and a laptop to present.

For those of you wondering why there is a $4 fee for the meetup, Meetup.com charges me $19 every month to be the organizer of this group. I have not been able to attend the meetings, but I still pay the fee every month.

If someone else would like to step up and pay this fee every month, be my guest, If I step down as organizer and another does not take my place the group will be dissolved by Meetup.com.

If you know of an unused classroom where we can meet, perhaps we can finally have a meeting!

Cheers

Paul

group.name: The Boston Digital Arts Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Digital Arts June Meetup
